title: John Goodman, Anthony Hopkins Lose Homes in Los Angeles Wildfires
description: Billy Crystal, Eugene Levy, Miles Teller, and Paris Hilton are among the other celebrities who've also lost their homes. John Goodman, Anthony Hopkins Lose Homes in Los Angeles Wildfires Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: John Goodman, Anthony Hopkins, Billy Crystal, and Paris Hiltons are among the celebrities who have lost their homes in the devastating Los Angeles wildfires.
text: As of the afternoon of Wednesday, January 8th, the devastating Los Angeles wildfires have claimed five lives and destroyed more than 1,100 structures. Among those affected are actors such as John Goodman, Anthony Hopkins, Billy Crystal, and Eugene Levy, who all lost their homes in the fires. According to Page Six, homes owned by Goodman, Hopkins, Crystal, and Levy in the Pacific Palisades were all destroyed over the last day. Other celebrities who lost their homes in the Los Angeles area include Miles Teller, Paris Hilton, Anna Faris, Adam Brody and Leighton Meester, Cameron Mathison, as well as Heidi Montag and Spencer Pratt. There are a number of ways people can assist Los Angeles-area residents, as well as first responders. The California Community Foundation is accepting donations, which will go towards aiding those affected by the fires. The California Fire Donation is also accepting donating. You can find more ways to help here.
